title: Climate Change
content: Lead a brawl against climate change by fabricating an innovative solution to forge a world where the future generations do not have to worry about the climate crisis.

title: Cyber Bullying
content: Build prudent solutions to help prevent people from succumbing to the spiral of cyberbullying and to combat misuse of technology and online harassment

title: Pandemic
content: Integrate an approach that helps people build up resilience to cope with the inevitable new normal by figuring strategies in the wake of pandemic.

title: Hunger Eradication
content: In order to shape a world where no one has to question the guarantee of a two square meal, devise projects that promise to eradicate hunger and offer sustainable sustenance resources.

title: Natural Disasters
content: Harnessing the power of technology, vouch for innovative solutions to address the uprising challenges caused by natural calamities.

title: Open Innovation
content: Let your imagination go haywire as you envision ideas that hold the capability to solve any problem that has been distressing mankind for ages.
